description: Unique identifier for this preventive maintenance detail record.
System timestamp when the record was created or last updated.
Date when the preventive maintenance is due.
Remaining meter units until maintenance is due; negative values mean overdue. Units follow the meter type.
Identifier for the preventive maintenance category or program.
Reference metadata indicating the related entity/field for the category key; likely used by UI or integration. Confirm with SME.
Identifier of the associated work order executing this maintenance.
Reference metadata indicating the related entity/field for the associated work order; likely used by UI or integration. Confirm with SME.
Identifier of the work order linked to this preventive maintenance detail.
Reference metadata indicating the related entity/field for the linked work order; likely used by UI or integration. Confirm with SME.
Type of meter used to schedule maintenance (e.g., distance, hours). Determines the units for meter-based fields.
Key value from the legacy source system for migration traceability.
Name of the legacy source table for this migrated record.
Identifier or flag for using a quick work order template on creation; 0/blank indicates none. Confirm exact behavior with SME.
Reference metadata indicating the related entity/field for the quick work order link; likely used by UI or integration. Confirm with SME.
Identifier of the equipment or asset associated to this maintenance detail; 0/blank indicates none.
Reference metadata indicating the related entity/field for the equipment link; likely used by UI or integration. Confirm with SME.
Identifier of a default employee for quick assignment; 0/blank indicates none. Confirm whether this stores an employee ID or a boolean flag with SME.
Reference metadata indicating the related entity/field for the quick employee link; likely used by UI or integration. Confirm with SME.
Option controlling how labor/work center is assigned for quick maintenance creation; value meanings are configuration-specific. Confirm with SME.
Indicates whether this record was created from a quick maintenance request feature.
Indicates that a new work order should be, or was, created for this PM item.
Indicates whether this item is part of a scheduled preventive maintenance plan.
